description:
The magic of Capilene is its ability to wick moisture and dry fast. With a smooth outer surface, the double-knit fabric slides under your top layers. A brushed-grid pattern on the back holds warmth near your skin. Not too heavy, not too light, these midweight bottoms take you from alpine snowfields to early-season campsites.

  • Made of thermal diamond grid recycled polyester double-knit fabric
  • HeiQ® Fresh durable odour treatment fights stink
  • Brushed elastic waistband is soft next to skin
  • Gusseted crotch with functional fly adds comfort and mobility
  • Flatlock seams minimize chafing
  • Slim fit to slide easily under other layers
name: Patagonia Capilene Mid Weight Bottom 2 - Women's
